body.p: Nicholas County, Kentucky, farmer. Married to Frances A. Hendricks in Nicholas County on July 7, 1842. Father of Mary E. Berry and Lucy H. Berry. Married to Eliza Roberston Berry in Winchester, Clark County, on September 29, 1855. Stepfather of Mary Robertson, John Robertson, and William Robertson. Father of James W. Berry, Ida Berry, and Bettie Berry. Farmer in Montgomery County in 1840. Farmer in Nicholas County in 1850. Owned one enslaved person in Nicholas County in 1850. Farmer in Nicholas County in 1860. Owned ten enslaved persons in Nicholas County in 1860.
